pageContent: Background: At present, one in six men over age 50 carries the diagnosis of prostate cancer, but only one in 33 will die of the disease. In view of these facts, conservative strategies such as active surveillance (AS) are important in the management of prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
External beam radiotherapy as curative treatment of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16007894/
